name: Price History Test
description: Test case for retrieving historical price data through agent interaction

parts.text: Show me the price history for AAPL over the past week.

Here's the price history for AAPL over the past week, showing hourly data:*This data provides a detailed look at how AAPL's price has fluctuated hourly over the last week. As a reminder, this is simulated paper trading data and does not involve real money.*Would you like to see the price history for a different period or for another stock?
